mapper.sql: lan_code, id, name, tel, addr, lat, longi, store_hours
mapper.select: SELECT s.lan_code as lanCode, s.id as id, s.name as name, s.tel as tel, s.addr as addr, s.lat as lat, s.longi as longi, s.store_hours as storeHours, AVG(CAST(((sR.interior+sR.rat_access+sR.cost_effect)/3) as DECIMAL(10,6))) as storeRating, AVG(CAST(pR.taste as DECIMAL(10,6))) as productRating FROM store s LEFT OUTER JOIN storeRating sR ON s.lan_code = sR.lan_code AND s.id = sR.id LEFT OUTER JOIN productRating pR ON s.lan_code = pR.lan_code AND s.id = pR.id WHERE s.lan_code = #{lanCode} GROUP BY s.lan_code, s.id, s.name, s.tel, s.addr, s.lat, s.longi, s.store_hours
SELECT FROM store WHERE id = #{id} and lan_code = #{lanCode}

SELECT s.lan_code as lanCode, s.id as id, s.name as name, s.tel as tel, s.addr as addr, s.lat as lat, s.longi as longi, s.store_hours as storeHours, AVG(CAST(((sR.interior+sR.rat_access+sR.cost_effect)/3) as DECIMAL(10,6))) as storeRating, AVG(CAST(pR.taste as DECIMAL(10,6))) as productRating FROM store s LEFT OUTER JOIN storeRating sR ON s.lan_code = sR.lan_code AND s.id = sR.id LEFT OUTER JOIN productRating pR ON s.lan_code = pR.lan_code AND s.id = pR.id WHERE s.lan_code = #{lanCode} AND s.name LIKE '%'||#{name}||'%' GROUP BY s.lan_code, s.id, s.name, s.tel, s.addr, s.lat, s.longi, s.store_hours
SELECT FROM store where lat = #{lat} AND longi = #{longi}

SELECT s.lan_code as lanCode, s.id as id, s.name as name, s.tel as tel, s.addr as addr, s.lat as lat, s.longi as longi, s.store_hours as storeHours, AVG(CAST(((sR.interior+sR.rat_access+sR.cost_effect)/3) as DECIMAL(10,6))) as storeRating, AVG(CAST(pR.taste as DECIMAL(10,6))) as productRating FROM store s LEFT OUTER JOIN storeRating sR ON s.lan_code = sR.lan_code AND s.id = sR.id LEFT OUTER JOIN productRating pR ON s.lan_code = pR.lan_code AND s.id = pR.id WHERE s.lan_code = #{lanCode} GROUP BY s.lan_code, s.id, s.name, s.tel, s.addr, s.lat, s.longi, s.store_hours ORDER BY ABS((s.lat-#{lat})*(s.longi-#{longi}))
